s = input()
t = input()

i = 0
j = 0

while i < len(s) and j < len(t):
    if s[i] == t[j]:
        i += 1
        j += 1
    else:
        j += 1

print(len(s) + len(t) - 2 * i)

s = input()
t = input()

print(len(s) + len(t) - 2 * len(set(s) & set(t)))
